name: NSObject.KeyValueObservingPublisher
desc: A Combine publisher that produces a new element whenever the observed value changes.

items.name: init(object: Subject, keyPath: KeyPath<Subject, Value>, options: NSKeyValueObservingOptions)
items.desc: Creates a key-value observing publisher for the given combination of object and key path, using publishing behavior options you provide.

items.name: let object: Subject
items.desc: The object that contains the property to publish.

items.name: let keyPath: KeyPath<Subject, Value>
items.desc: The key path, relative to the object receiving this message, of the property to publish.

items.name: let options: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: Options that determine which elements the publisher produces.

declaration: struct KeyValueObservingPublisher<Subject, Value> where Subject : NSObject
